name: Escape The Shadows
description:
Escape the shadows is a short, exciting  third person fighter. Fight your way through the cave to get to the light. Be careful when you attack, the less you attack the more health you have. Upgrade with XP to make the most of your attacks. 

How to Play:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use arrows or WASD to move.

Left Click to attack.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Upgrade attacks in pause menu (esc):

Shield: Blocks damage but stops your ability to move.

Spin Attack: More distance in your attack allowing you to make more use of your attacks.

Ground Pound: A slow area attack allowing you to defeat multiple enemies.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How it fits the theme: 

The less you attack, the more health you have.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game jam and second full game so any feedback is appreciated!

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam in one week .

Assets made by me with some animations from mixamo.

Made with Unity, Blender and GarageBand.
